name: Conflux Machines #04
description: An abstract piece consisting of one of my Kyoto cityscape photographs duplicated four times and arranged radially in a square. The centerpiece was created by 9 instances of the Content Aware fill function with blend mode set to Lighten, and 1 instance at the topmost layer set to Darken. By Lucius Felimus: https://www.luciusfelimus.com/
